languages.text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.
languages.original_text: Пистолет-дробовик. "Крушитель Врагов" — популярное среди офицеров и командиров военных кораблей оружие устрашающего вида.

traits.locale_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

languages.text: Пистолет-дробовик. "Крушитель Врагов" — популярное среди офицеров и командиров военных кораблей оружие устрашающего вида.

traits.locale_text: Пистолет-дробовик. "Крушитель Врагов" — популярное среди офицеров и командиров военных кораблей оружие устрашающего вида.

languages.text: Eine Schrotflintenpistole. Der Feindhammer ist bei vielen Schiffsoffizieren der Kriegsflotte und bei Besatzungsanführern beliebt, die eine einschüchternde Waffe brauchen.
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

traits.locale_text: Eine Schrotflintenpistole. Der Feindhammer ist bei vielen Schiffsoffizieren der Kriegsflotte und bei Besatzungsanführern beliebt, die eine einschüchternde Waffe brauchen.

languages.text: Pistolet à cartouches. Le « marteleur d'ennemi » est très prisé de nombreux officiers et de chefs d'équipage qui ont besoin d'une arme intimidante.
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

traits.locale_text: Pistolet à cartouches. Le « marteleur d'ennemi » est très prisé de nombreux officiers et de chefs d'équipage qui ont besoin d'une arme intimidante.

languages.text: 一把霰弹手枪。敌者之锤在海军军官中深受欢迎，这把可怕的武器可以吓破敌人的胆子。
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

traits.locale_text: 一把霰弹手枪。敌者之锤在海军军官中深受欢迎，这把可怕的武器可以吓破敌人的胆子。

languages.text: Una pistola escopeta. El Martillo de Enemigos es popular entre los oficiales de la Armada y entre los jefes de tripulación que necesitan un arma intimidante.
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

traits.locale_text: Una pistola escopeta. El Martillo de Enemigos es popular entre los oficiales de la Armada y entre los jefes de tripulación que necesitan un arma intimidante.

languages.text: ショットガンピストル。〈かたき殺しの鎚〉は威嚇できる武器を必要とする海軍の軍艦士官や乗組員長の間では人気がある。
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

traits.locale_text: ショットガンピストル。〈かたき殺しの鎚〉は威嚇できる武器を必要とする海軍の軍艦士官や乗組員長の間では人気がある。

languages.text: Pompalı bir tabanca. Hasım Tepen, birçok donanma gemisi subayının yanı sıra göz korkutucu bir silaha ihtiyaç duyan mürettebat şefleri arasında da gözdedir.
languages.original_text: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.
